title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, May 29, 2013
description: Mighty Germany gets a wake up call about jobs. Booksellers and publishers gather  in New York City for the biggest publishing event in North America -- BookExpo. Even in the face of fierce digital competition from giants Amazon and Apple, independent retailers aren't buckling. And what's next for federal student loan rates?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, May 29, 2013
teaser: Mighty Germany gets a wake up call about jobs. Booksellers and publishers gather  in New York City for the biggest publishing event in North America -- BookExpo. byline: Shannon Mullen, Gigi Douban, Chester Wisniewski, Bruce Johnson, Queena Kim, Sara Evans, Adrienne Hill, Karen Clark and David Brancaccio
